name: Suspicious Blazed Meat Stew
desc: A spicy meat stew. The excessive spiciness sets your mouth ablaze... and your stomach too, once you force the meat down your belabored gullet. Now if only there was a large cup of water to put these flames out...

customize.name: Recipe: Blazed Meat Stew
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Blazed Meat Stew.

customize.name: Blazed Meat Stew
customize.desc: A spicy meat stew. Raw meat is seasoned with an array of different spices, then slow-cooked until tender. The moment you open the lid, a hot and spicy aroma wafts out to greet you. When you're not sure what to eat when it's time to celebrate, you can't go wrong with this!

customize.name: Delicious Blazed Meat Stew
customize.desc: A spicy meat stew. All manner of spices bring out the rich aroma of meat. A well-tuned spiciness awakens your slumbering tastebuds with its touch, and as the meat meets your teeth, its rich juices spill forth, filling your heart with sumptuous joy. Not a drop, you declare, shall be spared. Not one drop.

customize.name: Suspicious Blazed Meat Stew
customize.desc: A spicy meat stew. The excessive spiciness sets your mouth ablaze... and your stomach too, once you force the meat down your belabored gullet. Now if only there was a large cup of water to put these flames out...

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Glabrous Beans
customize.desc: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

value.text: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
